ShouldersSMUprightRow.name: Smith Upright Row
ShouldersSMUprightRow.preparation: Stand behind bar midthigh height. Grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright.
ShouldersSMUprightRow.execution: Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersSMUprightRow.synergists: infraspinatus, brachioradialis, serratusanterior, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, supraspinatus, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, teresminor

ShouldersSMWideGripUprightRow.name: Smith Wide Grip Upright Row
ShouldersSMWideGripUprightRow.preparation: Stand behind bar midthigh height. Grasp bar with wide grip overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright.
ShouldersSMWideGripUprightRow.execution: Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersSMWideGripUprightRow.synergists: infraspinatus, brachioradialis, serratusanterior, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, supraspinatus, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, teresminor
